pr_title: Refactor and fix debugger integration tests for new project API

timeline.bodyText: Do we need this completely commented out file?
timeline.author: azinneera

replies.bodyText: The project won't compile as this module is having std-lib dependencies, so the plan is to migrate the before mentioned HTTP service based tests into the distribution repo. +1 to remove the related content until that. Fixed with 9e0ad3a
replies.author: NipunaRanasinghe

timeline.bodyText: Shall we enable these tests as well? Do we have any issues in that?
timeline.author: praveennadarajah
